actionConfiguration.body:
select  
    (sum(case when p_annual_income > 4000000 then 1 else 0 end)::numeric(15,2)/count(*)::numeric(15,2)*100)::numeric(15,2) as p_luxury,
    (sum(case when p_annual_income < 2000000 then 1 else 0 end)::numeric(15,2)/count(*)::numeric(15,2)*100)::numeric(15,2) as p_smart,
    (sum(case when tot_household_members  > 2 then 1 else 0 end)::numeric(15,2)/count(*)::numeric(15,2)*100)::numeric(15,2) as p_family
from potential_buyer pb  
where radii <= {{Select2.selectedOptionValue}}
